coref_content: Mr. Revilla ’s camp file a 66 - page brief before the court ’s First Division ahead of the start of the trial proper for the case against Mr. Revilla ’s, which list the name of people Mr. Revilla ’s want summon in court as part of the defense ’s witness. Mr. Revilla ’s be currently detain at the Philippine National Police Custodial Center in Camp Crame, Quezon City, as Mr. Revilla ’s face plunder and graft charge for the allege misuse of Mr. Revilla ’s's Priority Development Assistance Fund ( PDAF ). Mr. Revilla ’s be accuse of channel his Priority Development Assistance Fund ( PDAF ) to bogus nongovernment organization amount to p517 million, where Mr. Revilla ’s allegedly pocket kickback amount to p224.5 million from 2004 to 2010. among the name of people he want summon in court as part of the defense ’s witness be Interior Secretary Manuel A. Roxas II, Budget Secretary Florencio B. Abad, Senate President Franklin M. Drilon who formerly chair the Senate finance committee, Camarines Sur Rep. Rolando G. Andaya, Jr. who be a former Budget secretary, and former Commission on Audit chairperson Ma. Gracia Pulido - Tan. Mr. Revilla ’s's lawyer also want to summon no less than allege scam queen Janet Lim - Napoles, along with Mr. Revilla ’s's co - accused Senator Juan Ponce Enrile and Mr. Revilla ’s's former aide Richard A. Cambe to testify in Mr. Revilla ’s's defense. scam whistle - blower Benhur K. Luy, Marina C. Sula, Merlina P. Suñas and Ruby C. Tuason be also name, as well as official of implement agency and bank representative, among other. Mr. Revilla, who have be in jail since June last year for the charge, also say Mr. Revilla ’s would take the witness stand Mr. Revilla ’s if necessary. after Mr. Revilla ’s be deny bail last year, the court ’s be now gear towards the start of the trial proper for the case against hethe case against he. the starting date, however, have not yet be set. all these people, Mr. Revilla ’s lawyer say, would speak to prove that Mr. Revilla ’s never sign any project proposal, list of beneficiary, or accomplishment report that lead to the illegal his Priority Development Assistance Fund ( PDAF ) deal. Mr. Revilla ’s also deny profit from the suppose scheme. -- Melissa Luz T. Lopez.
